title: RKeen - Change Pink to Red!
content:
[url=http://qsilver90.com/files/Rkeen4.7z]Download Rkeen4.7z[/url]
[url=http://qsilver90.com/files/Rkeen5.7z]Download Rkeen5.7z[/url]
[url=http://qsilver90.com/files/Rkeen6.7z]Download Rkeen6.7z[/url]

Update: Episodes 5 and 6 finished, with some changes to Episode 4.

Update: Batch file error in RKEEN4.BAT fixed.

In what is quite possibly the most useless mod to date, you can now change Keen's shirt color from pink to red. Exhilirating, isn't it? But hey, it's 3/14, and I had to do something. I was hoping to release kMod Alpha, but that will unfortunately have to wait (it's nothing spectacular, though - it's not even Beta quality).

title: Re: RKEEN4 - Change Pink to Red!
content:
Hah, at least we got something.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopekeen.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."
